items.title: ‘Springsteen’ star Jeremy Allen White on his favorite reality shows and obsession with real estate
items.description: The actor says he likes to “decompress” by perusing properties he knows he’ll likely never buy.

items.title: The so-called ‘great debasement trade’ is back on as gold sets fresh record, says this strategist
items.description: A rise in geopolitical tensions and the search for inflation hedges are fuelling the surge in precious metal prices

items.title: Clearwater Analytics went on a buying spree. Now it’s getting bought in an $8.4 billion deal.
items.description: Clearwater Analytics over the weekend agreed to a buyout from private-equity firms, after the stock market failed to reward a string of acquisitions t...

items.title: ‘I would like to give her a head start in life’: My house rose in value by $500K. Do I gift it to my daughter at a bargain price?
items.description: “I would sell it to her for enough to allow me to pay cash for a much smaller condo.”

items.title: My husband and I are splitting our estate between his child and my three children. Should they get equal shares?
items.description: “We try to help all our kids when we can, yet push for self-sufficiency.”
